body.name: LEGO Disney Princess Twirling Rapunzel 43214 Building Toy with Diamond Dress Mini-Doll and Pascal The Chameleon Figure, Wind Up Toy Rapunzel, Disney Collectible Toy for Girls & Boys Age 5+ Years Old

features: LEGO | Disney Princess buildable toy features a LEGO Rapunzel mini-doll figure in a ‘diamond’ dress, plus a buildable stand with a turning top
The playset, reminiscent of classic spinning dolls, includes a buildable stand with a key, plus a space for Pascal the chameleon LEGO figure
Featuring a Rapunzel LEGO mini-doll figure with a transforming ‘diamond’ dress that connects with a purple umbrella to store the mini-doll inside
Kids can build Rapunzel’s stand, set her on top, turn the key and help her dance around, sparkling imaginations while helping to build confidence
This Rapunzel buildable toy makes a fun birthday gift for kids Ages 5+ and can be combined with other Disney Princess sets (sold separately)
body.description: Captivate kids Ages 5 and over with this LEGO | Disney Princess Twirling Rapunzel (43214) buildable toy playset. Fans can twirl around with Disney’s Rapunzel in her ‘diamond’ dress with this imaginative LEGO set. This collectible Disney Princess buildable toy features a stand with decorative details, a key and space for Pascal the chameleon LEGO figure, plus a Rapunzel mini-doll figure with an umbrella and a ‘diamond’ dress. Kids build Rapunzel’s stand, set her on top, turn the key and help her dance around. When it’s time to rest, they can use Rapunzel’s umbrella and dress to create a diamond-shaped storage container to store the mini-doll between playtimes. Kids can enjoy an easy and intuitive building adventure with the LEGO Builder app, which lets them zoom in and rotate models in 3D, save sets and track their progress. Disney’s Rapunzel fans gain meaningful skills while playing with this collectible set. The build helps grow children’s confidence while sparking their imagination and creativity as they play out film-based scenes or invent their own. It makes a magical birthday or ‘just because’ gift for kids Ages 5+ years old who love Disney Princess and LEGO building toys. The box (including mini-doll) measures over 4.5 in. (11 cm) high, 2.5 in. (6 cm) wide and 2 in. (5 cm) deep. Contains 89 Pieces.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Neat little treat for Disney Princess fans This LEGO ǀ Disney set features a buildable twirling stand and a detailed Rapunzel mini-doll figure with a ‘diamond’ dress.
Start the fun with a great building experience The fun starts with building the set, boosting kids’ confidence and construction skills before they get to playing.

LEGO ǀ Disney Twirling Rapunzel Spinning stand Disney’s Rapunzel can twirl around with the turn of a key. 2 characters for role play Set includes Disney’s Rapunzel and Pascal the chameleon. Built-in storage Umbrella and ‘diamond’ dress become mini-doll storage.
Enter a new world of building Builders can zoom in and rotate models in 3D and track their progress using the fun, intuitive LEGO Builder app.
A fun treat for fans of Disney’s Rapunzel This set can be played with alongside other LEGO ǀ Disney ‘diamond’ dress sets (sold separately) for unlimited fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable lego set but tinier than expected
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 4 year old granddaughter for Christmas. She needed help from her Mom assembling it, but it looks as cute as what's shown in the photo. The pieces really move and the pieces were very bright and colorful. I was disappointed that the set was tinier than expected, but Savannah loved it and so I'm glad I purchased it. If you have tiny children in your home, or pets, I would be careful to keep this far away from them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My granddaughter loves this set!
reviews.reviewText: This Lego Rapunzel set has been a delightful addition to my granddaughter's collection. She absolutely adores it! The attention to detail is impressive. The set provides hours of creative play, allowing her to recreate her favorite scenes from the movie Tangled. At age 6, she was able to put it together with minimal effort. It's been a fantastic source of entertainment and imaginative play, and I couldn't be happier with her joy and enthusiasm for this Lego set.
